# TmAddFileRequest

**Properties**

| Name        | Type | Required | Description                   |
| :---------- | :--- | :------- | :---------------------------- |
| id\_        | str  | ✅       | Internal identifier of a file |
| content_uri | str  | ✅       | Link to binary content        |
| name        | str  | ❌       | Name of a file                |
